page.title: 13LANDSCAPE
page.content: The Lake by Helen Bradford,age 10 ___________________________________ It laps against the bank The waves spread out smoothly Lapping over one another. Someone throws a stone in And the whirlpool slowly expands... Suddenly it touches the bank And starts fading away... In a minute it is gone. Slowly in the distance A swan smoothly swims... A small wash comes from behind... It swims away in the distance... Above the water Mountains tower high reflecting in the water, Trees cover them from ground to the top, Not a gap from tree to tree, All along the edge of the lake... Mountains high,Dressed in green trees
